s: These chestnuts, for the price, are very good!! I am ordering my second batch of 24 packs today. For me, they are just right! ... This was my first time purchasing this brand. They're rather dry and have that unpleasant edge some chestnuts can get. They're not very sweet, just starchy.

t: Amazon.com: Fresh -GPS-raw chestnut 3 Lbs : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: Was not fresh, had not taste. I don’t mind paying a high price, but fresh chestnuts are brown and shiny, this ones were light brown and dry. I baked the batch and not flavor at all, nothing! I wish I could have returned even if I cooked all!
